name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed scripts via a compromised command shell, leading to unauthorized data exfiltration.

action--f1b67154-13a9-4c1e-9a9c-2189b0de.description: Terminate any suspicious script process running.

action--de02d6e1-a5c4-4afc-85b0-09c8fae5.name: Monitor file transfer logs
action--de02d6e1-a5c4-4afc-85b0-09c8fae5.description: Continue monitoring file transfer logs to detect any unusual activities.

while-condition--aa8a8eb0-118e-4c88-b9e0.name: Isolate affected host until secure
while-condition--aa8a8eb0-118e-4c88-b9e0.description: Isolate the affected host from the network.

action--aa8a8eb0-118e-4c88-b9e0-b1bef580.description: Drop any incoming connections from the affected host to prevent further data exfiltration.
